profile_languages.name: Creools en pidgins, op het Frans gebaseerd

profile_positions.description:
Food Forces was formed by two friends with the same goal: to bring to the Netherlands from around the globe the finest and freshest fresh products possible.
 
At Food Forces first we opened our doors in 2008 as a fresh fruit importer with offices in the prestigious World Trade Center Rotterdam, in 2010 as our company’s success grew we expanded and moved to a warehouse storage and packaging facility in the fruit harbor in Rotterdam.
 
In the summer of 2013 we took up larger premises to accomplish our company strategy and vision. We took the decision to cooperate and became a partner of The Forces Group (Port Forces, Fruit Forces).
 
In this line we took the decision to move to another warehouse in the same area of the port in Rotterdam. We combined the office, packing and chill plant near the river the Maas, and immediately set about re-generating it to our requirements to ensure that we are able to meet all future challenges. We moved into this newly re-generated area in July 2013. Since then, we have continually improved and expanded the site to meet and exceed our requirements and that of our customers.
 
Primarily Food Forces supplies importers, exporters, processing companies, supermarkets and retailers nationally and internationally. Over the years, we have also shifted our focus from being solely an importer, to become a major force as a grower and developer as well. In combination with our local partners in Morocco, Egypt and Costa Rica we believe that this gives us superior control in our produce, and a far greater knowledge of the whole business that enables us to deliver first class products to our clients.
 
It is a testament for Food Forces as a whole that we have dedicated employees who have been working in the fruit harbor area for over 30 years. We have built Food Forces to be a family company that cares for its family, for it is only when you have a family that cares about its products that you can really excel and drive forward.
profile_positions.title: Financiel Directeur

profile_positions.description:
Het verkopen van, hardware en abonnementen van NL providers op gebied van mobiele telefonie, vaste telefonie en internet diensten. 
Daarnaast dragen wij zorg voor het Locale netwerk van onze clienten inclusief bekabelings werkzaamheden en plaatssen van routers en switches en opleveren van werkplekken met inbound of outbound netwerk servers voor onze clienten.
Vanaf 2010 leveren wij ook diensten en producten voor tracability van roerende goederen zoals track en trace voor wagenpark beheer en complete logistieke systemen voor de Ware House Management Systeem (Master WMS) in AGF sector.
Master WMS is speciaal ontwikkeld voor de AGF sector maar kan desgewenst aangepast worden voor ieder andere branche op project bassis.
profile_positions.title: Ondernemer

profile_positions.description:
Klant relatie onderhouden met importeurs en exporteurs voornamelijk Midden Oosten en franstalige landen.
Promoten van het Ware House Management Systeem dat speciaal ontwikkeld is voor FruitForces en al haar aangesloten clienten.
profile_positions.title: Account manager
